body:
can you add 1 or more pickle files from a pre-0.20 version using the instructions here: https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/master/pandas/tests/io/generate_legacy_storage_files.py

this is in effect a test, IOW w/o this patch ``pandas/tests/io/test_pickle.py ``should fail, with it they should pass.

Thanks @jreback. I added timedelta, float, uint64, range, and interval indexes to the generate_legacy_storage_files script. I've generated pickles for 0.16.2 and 0.19.2 (which happen to be what I had on hand).

In running the script I realized IntervalIndex doesn't serialize on master for msgpack and neither do the date offsets. I've put these under the not supported section at generate_legacy_storage_files.py:289 so that it's green, but perhaps this is an issue that should be supported?
